title: Tungsten Hammer
summaries: The Tungsten Hammer is an early-game hammer, being stronger than the Lead Hammer, but weaker than the Platinum Hammer. It has an alternate ore version, the Silver Hammer, which is slightly weaker. Like all hammers, it is used to remove background walls and create sloped tiles and half tiles.
Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes.

statistics.Sell: 12
